title: Account get suspended
body: : ( have not play for a month,  then come back yesterday, see my account get suspended for no reasons, so sad.

replies.body:
It's possible the account was suspended for a compromise, in which case the suspension would be revoked once you have gone through the account recovery process with Support (use this link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and choose the "Recover my account" option, then fill in as much info as you can and follow the prompts).

If the account wasn't suspended due to a compromise, you should have received a "reform card" in the client giving a reason for the suspension and any relevant evidence (such as chat logs for chat related offences, links to specific matches in match history for gameplay related offences etc). You should have also received an email about the suspension to the registered email address. In that case, you have the option of appealing the suspension with Support (use the same link from before, but instead choose the "Account suspensions or restrictions" option) if you believe you were falsely punished. Keep in mind, it may take several days to receive a response (particularly if Support is busy), you may receive a "generic copy-paste" response, and they're decision is final.
